name: Old Street Media
slogan: The Future of Amazon Ad Services: Automation & Live Campaign Chat Support
description:
We build Amazon Advertising automation software and provide LIVE campaign chat support. All support agents are Amazon accredited.

We work with companies of all sizes including global Fortune 500 companies and lean private label marketplace sellers.

Our software supports 10B+ impressions, $150M+ attributed ad sales, 1000+ vendors & sellers, and 10 countries with live ads.

team.name: Yoda Y.
team.bioHtml:
Currently running and advertising & eCommerce technology company.

Ex-Amazon & went to UCLA.

jobs.title: Business Development Associate
jobs.description:
Title: Business Development Associate

Description
Old Street Media is looking for an exceptionally motivated and talented Business Development Associate. The Business Development Associate plans and delivers quota, implements prospect acquisition and customer growth campaigns, and fosters voice of customer feedback. The ideal candidate will have experience in consistently delivering/exceeding quotas, executing sales strategy and tactics, and developing cross-functional relationships to voice customer feedback to internal stakeholders. 

We expect that you can work autonomously, think both strategically and tactically, and take full control and responsibility for achieving your sales objectives. You will be encouraged to be a thought leader in the industry and speak at relevant events. If successful, you will engage in projects that will drive business growth and help shape the future of our global SaaS business.

Role Objectives
•	Identify, prospect, and recruit potential clients to Old Street Media by calling, emailing or attending commercial events and trade fairs and explaining the benefits of our software
•	Take ownership in the continued build-out and documentation of the infrastructure and processes of acquiring and onboarding SaaS customers
•	Act as the ‘business owner’ for his or her regions, possessing a complete understanding of internal and external variables that impact our clients' businesses. 
•	Partner with Engineering teams to provide customer perspective as well as customer-driven product improvement ideas

Qualifications
•	Passionate about online business, e-commerce, and sales
•	Proven experience whether it be in digital marketing agencies, management consulting, investment banking, partner success in a large business, or of a growing startup
•	Working knowledge of B2B sales, procurement processes, and experience working with senior management in large organizations
•	Track record of consistently meeting or exceeding sales targets
•	Data-driven decision-making mentality and sound commercial judgment through analytical thinking to assess client performance and financial viability
•	Ability to build strong relationships with external partners as well as internal stakeholders
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to explain complex concepts in a simple and clear way
•	Experience using Excel to analyse data and to support decision-making
•	Educated to at least degree level or compensating work experience

Preferred Qualifications
•	Experience using Vendor Central, Seller Central, and other e-commerce platforms including eBay & Walmart
•	Experience negotiating with various levels of a Fortune 500 company from analysts to C-suite
•	Proven ability to influence others
•	Knowledge of Amazon Ad software industry
•	Working knowledge of another language including German, French, Italian, or Spanish

About Old Street Media
Old Street Media builds automation software and provides marketplace & advertising services for Fortune 500 brands, challenger brands, and media agencies. Come and experience a company that is growing quickly with a strong startup mentality.

jobs.title: Digital Operations Associate
jobs.description:
Title: Digital Operations Associate

Description
Old Street Media is looking for an exceptionally motivated and talented Digital Strategy & Operations Manager who can collaborate with brands & sellers to expand their global Amazon businesses. We expect that you can work autonomously, think both strategically and tactically, and take full control and responsibility for achieving your business objectives. You will be encouraged to identify ways to automate and simplify manual processes in order to improve productivity. You will also ensure that your team identifies, engages, and integrates a portfolio of new brands to our agency business, as well as analysing complex data to identify growth opportunities to help our team succeed. If successful, you will engage in projects that will drive business growth and help shape the future of our global agency business.

Role Objectives
•	Act as the ‘business owner’ for his or her categories, possessing a complete understanding of internal and external variables that impact our clients' businesses
•	Develop plans in conjunction with your clients to build sustainable long-term partnerships through adding products, experimenting with new growth tactics (eg. effective marketing & advertising), growing same-product sales (eg. product optimisation), or other 'think big' ideas
•	Master Amazon’s tools and systems so that you can be self-sufficient and translate our clients' goals to actionable inputs
•	Use your analytical ability combined with operational rigour to build tools and processes to drive forward partnership KPIs.
•	Identify, prospect, and recruit potential clients to Old Street Media by calling, emailing or attending commercial events and trade fairs and explaining the benefits of a Partnership with Old Street Media

Qualifications
•	Passionate about online business, e-commerce, and sales
•	Proven experience whether it be in digital marketing agencies, management consulting, investment banking, partner success in a large business, or of a growing startup
•	Data-driven decision making mentality and sound commercial judgment through analytical thinking to assess client performance and financial viability
•	Great project manager who can develop meticulously detailed KPI improvement plans in collaboration with enterprise clients and then deliver them to plan regardless of any surprises or ambiguity along the way
•	Ability to build strong relationships with external partners as well as internal stakeholders
•	Excellent written and verbal communication skills with the ability to explain complex concepts in a simple and clear way
•	Experience using Excel to analyse data and to support decision-making
•	Educated to at least degree level or compensating work experience

Preferred Qualifications
•	Experience using Vendor Central, Seller Central, and other e-commerce platforms including eBay & Walmart
•	Experience working with all levels of a Fortune 500 company from analysts to C-suite
•	Working knowledge of another language including German, French, Italian, or Spanish
•	Working knowledge of SQL

About Old Street Media
Old Street Media builds automation software and provides marketplace & advertising services for Fortune 500 brands, challenger brands, and media agencies. Come and experience a company that is growing quickly with a strong startup mentality.
